name: Smashteroids (Nekro)
description:
SMASHTEROIDS

WE REGRET TO INFORM PILOTS THAT, DUE TO BUDGET CUTS, NEW TRIANGLE SHIPS WILL BE FITTED WITH REINFORCED HULL WHERE THE LASERS USED TO BE.

SMASH STUFF HARD. FIND MORE FUEL. DON'T GET STUCK.

DEVELOPED IN HAXEFLIXEL FOR HTML.  RUNS ON MOST BROWSERS, INCLUDING MOBILE DEVICES.

SUBMISSION FOR GMTK JAM 2018. THEME: [GENRE] WITHOUT [MECHANIC].

SFX MADE USING BFXR, FONT AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE FONTS.
